p: The results are expressed as the means ± SEM ( n = 3). Data were processed using one-way analysis of variance (ANOVA), followed by Tukey’s test. Firstly, all the data were tested for normal distribution and homogeneity of variance. Then, the group means could be further compared using Tukey’s multiple range test. All statistical analysis were performed using SPSS 22.0 (SPSS, Chicago, IL, United States). A value of P < 0.05 was considered statistically significant. OriginPro 8.5 software (OriginLab, Los Angeles, CA, United States) was used for figure processing.
